articles.title: Indian air strikes - how will Pakistan respond? Four key questions - BBC
articles.description: Experts from India and Pakistan weigh in on what’s next -  and how this clash differs from past conflicts.
articles.content:
Pakistan claims to have shot down five Indian fighter jets - India has not confirmed this
